results.title: Mediation of humoral catecholamine secretion by the renin-angiotensin system in hypotensive rainbow trout (Oncorhynchus mykiss).
results.text_hl: By itself, @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ treatment caused a gradual and sustained decrease in @<m>DISEASE_Ductus_Arteriosus_Patent</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004374 @@@PDA@@@ and RS, and reductions in basal plasma Ang II and @CHEMICAL_Epinephrine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004837 @@@adrenaline@@@ concentrations.

citations.NLM: Bernier NJ, Kaiya H, Takei Y, Perry SF. Mediation of humoral catecholamine secretion by the renin-angiotensin system in hypotensive rainbow trout (Oncorhynchus mykiss). J Endocrinol. 1999 Mar;160(3):351-63. PMID: 10076182
